data_sources.description: A dataset containing pixel data of small images used for image search and classification based on visual similarities.

data_variables.name: vector_length
data_variables.description: Length of the vector representing each image, set to 400.

data_variables.name: Ntrees
data_variables.description: Number of trees in the Annoy model, used to organize the data for approximate nearest neighbor search.

data_variables.name: t
data_variables.description: An instance of AnnoyIndex representing a model built from the data, initialized with a single tree.

data_variables.name: tbig
data_variables.description: A larger instance of AnnoyIndex built with a larger dataset and multiple trees.

data_variables.name: tbad
data_variables.description: An instance of AnnoyIndex built with a small dataset to observe degradation in results.

data_flow.flow: Trained with image data, queried for neighbors, and used for analyzing results (image comparisons).
Trained with a larger dataset for better neighbor search results, queried similarly for neighbors.
Trained with a very small dataset to demonstrate performance degradation, queried for neighbor search.

models.name: Annoy
models.description: Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search using Forest model.
models.input_features: Image pixel values represented as vectors.
models.target_variable: Nearest neighbor images based on pixel similarity.
